1/1:
To address the request for adding G-code syntax highlighting to Prism, we need to make modifications in the `components.js` file to include the G-code language. Here's how we can do it:

### Bug Scenario Images and Reasoning

The image shows a G-code snippet with comments and commands. The request is to add syntax highlighting for G-code in Prism, which is a popular syntax highlighter. The root cause of the issue is the absence of G-code in the list of supported languages in the Prism components.

### Bug Location and Fix

We need to add an entry for G-code in the `components.js` file under the `languages` section. This will allow Prism to recognize and highlight G-code syntax.

### Patches

```javascript
### components.js
<<<<<<< SEARCH
"yaml":{"title":"YAML","owner":"hason"}},"plugins":{"meta":{"path":"plugins/{id}/prism-{id}","link":"plugins/{id}/"},"line-highlight":"Line Highlight"
=======
"yaml":{"title":"YAML","owner":"hason"},"gcode":{"title":"G-code","owner":"kmoser77"}},"plugins":{"meta":{"path":"plugins/{id}/prism-{id}","link":"plugins/{id}/"},"line-highlight":"Line Highlight"
>>>>>>> REPLACE
```

This patch adds the G-code language to the list of supported languages in the Prism components, enabling syntax highlighting for G-code.
